name: AI Agent for Intergenerational Communication
description: Designed an AI agent to improve intergenerational communication via WeChat. Integrated LLM-based features and presented in Moonshot Hackathon. The project helps bridge communication gaps between generations using intelligent conversation assistance.
contribution: Led the team in designing the overall architecture, integrated LLM APIs, and developed the WeChat interface. Presented the project at the hackathon and received positive feedback.

name: Wheel-Legged Robot Project
description: Developed wheel-legged robots using PID tuning for balance and motion control. The robot can switch between wheel and leg modes for different terrains, demonstrating advanced control algorithms.
contribution: 主要参与了机器人搭建、硬件调试、PID调参和机器人操控工作。

name: F18 Cockpit Central Control (PCB Project)
description: Redesigned F-18 cockpit circuit using custom PCB to replace breadboard prototypes. The project involved circuit design, PCB layout, and hardware integration for a flight simulator cockpit.
contribution: Designed the PCB layout in JLCEDA, optimized circuit routing for signal integrity, and managed the hardware integration process. The custom PCB significantly improved reliability compared to breadboard prototypes.

name: Physics Teaching Aids
description: Designed low-cost tools to visualize the Coriolis Effect and improve physics learning. The project aims to make abstract physics concepts more tangible through hands-on demonstrations.
contribution: Conceived the project idea, designed the 3D models for the teaching aids, integrated Arduino sensors for data collection, and tested the effectiveness in educational settings.

name: Food Expiration Prevention Device
description: Created a fridge layout and Arduino alert system for food expiration reminders. The device monitors food items and sends notifications to prevent waste.
contribution: Developed the hardware components including sensor integration, designed the Arduino firmware for monitoring, and created the mobile app interface for notifications.

name: Gomoku Ultra: Strategic Battle Game
description: Enhanced Gomoku with special pieces and strategic rules, implemented in Java. The game features unique gameplay mechanics that add depth to the classic board game.
contribution: Designed the game mechanics, implemented the core game logic in Java, created the user interface, and managed version control using Git.
